extendedInfo.description: I'f you're here about the NerdJunkies contest, you're in the right place!  If you're not here about the contest, please click http://goo.gl/S4kBC to learn more!Play the game that is climbing up the charts on the amazon app store!  "..takes me back to âthe good oleâ daysâ of the NES era......This is definitely my âgo toâ game for those moments where I just need to occupy myself." - NerdJunkiesThe Coffee Berry Borers are infecting Coffee Plantations worldwide! Learn to jump, fly and stomp out these evil coffee villains. Use a caffeine gyro-bomb to freeze, control and explode your enemies. Help KONA and his Coffee Bean friends eliminate these pests and put and end to this global epidemic.- 25 different levels providing you hours of game play- Hilariously entertaining characters and vibrant graphics- Meet his friends in all of the top coffee regions around the world- Get certified in each country and help KONA get back to Hawaii*INTERNET ACCESS IS NEEDED FOR STATISTICS and IN-GAME Advertising ONLY, IN-GAME DISABLE OF STATISTICS IS AVAIL UNDER OPTIONS***We listen to all feedback and do our best to make sure that every player gets the best experience possible.  If you ever have any questions, comments, or problems, email feedback@dakinemobile.com and we'll get back to you immediately*****1.05 addresses the issue with HTC devices with SENSE.  We are sorry for the inconvenience.***

reviews.title: Kona\'s coffee conquest
reviews.comment: Awesome graphics great game play. Can\'t wait for more levels
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the game, could use some music though, maybe a catchy 8bit tune.
reviews.author: A Google User
